attributes.action: Abolish public transport costs for students 18+
attributes.background: There are financially deprived students who are discouraged from attending University. Abolishing public transport costs could save a student lots of money for necessary equipment; books, stationery. This will also decrease the number of students boarding trains with invalid tickets due to no money.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting fares on public transport.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to provide funding for students' public transport costs.
